Description:
Exquisite Elegance, Elite Locale
Perfectly positioned in an exclusive complex for a lifestyle of low maintenance luxury, this beautifully updated, single level premium townhouse, accommodates a variety of astute buyers.
Enjoying all this elite suburb has to offer, the secure home promotes the finest in sleek, sophisticated living. A manicured front garden shares a welcoming first impression.
Stepping inside to Tasmanian Oak timber floorboards creating warmth as you travel through to the sun lit family area and adjoining modern kitchen with gas cook top and breakfast bar. A spacious lounge and combined dining offer a private garden aspect and deliver a sense of ambience and grace, making it the perfect space to spend time with family and friends.
Comprising 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms plus separate study, the master bedroom with spacious WIR and ensuite abounds with class. The stylish main bathroom has been finished to the highest of standards and includes quality fixtures, vanity and bath, with the convenience of a separate toilet.
Entirely comfortable for immediate enjoyment, this enchanting home also includes double glazed windows, ducted heating, ceiling fans, low maintenance gardens and double remote garage.
Presenting an outstanding opportunity for professionals, downsizers and investors. Set in an elite locale with only minute's drive to local schools, Geelong Hospital, South Geelong railway station and less than 30 minutes drive to the ever popular Bellarine Peninsula to visit all the local wineries and enjoy the gorgeous bay views, or a drive down the Great Ocean Road.
Insights: 4/3-5 Lomond Terrace, East Geelong VIC 3219 was last sold in 2019 and 16 other 2 bedroom house in East Geelong have recently been sold.

Description:
Newcombs best buy
The search for great value property can be difficult in todays market. Here's a fantastic opportunity for first home buyers or investors alike, with a low maintenance brick veneer residence. Most of the hard wok is done with new kitchen with great bench space, pantry and dishwasher. The north facing open plan dining and living space has lots of natural light along with 3 bedrooms, master with robe, separate laundry and bathroom with scope to improve. The solar panels keep the energy bills to a minimum and there is ducted heating. Outdoors there's a patio area with lock up back yard and double garage/workshop. The 535m2 block sits within 5 mins to Geelong CBD, Newcomb Village Shopping centre and public transport is nearby. For sale with vacant possession or potential rental of $365pw this one is well worth a look. Call today for more information

Description:
SOLID HOME IN GROWING POCKET
This Solid 4 bedroom, 2 bath, plus study home sits on approx. 544m2 and would suit a young couple starting out, a growing family or savvy investor with a potential rent of $400 pw.
Comprising of Master at the front of the home with ceiling fan and BIR plus a spacious updated two way ensuite bathroom offering shower, large modern vanity, toilet and heat lamps.
There are two additional bedrooms located at the front of the home, one with gas heater and Kelvinator AC system and the other bedroom offers built in robes and block-out blinds.
Stepping into central kitchen you will be greeted with a large island bench with 5 burner gas cooktop, Miele dishwasher and ample cupboard space plus walk in pantry.
Stepping down towards the rear of the home you will find a handy study area and a spacious laundry/toilet/second shower. Plus a huge main living room where the whole family can unwind and come together. It offers spacious bright living space and dining area accommodating up to 10.
There is also a 4th bedroom with BIR, which would make for an ideal studio or home office.
Outside is a 9 metre shed with 15 amp power supply and can fit up to 3 car0 , plus 8000 litre water tank & bird aviary towards the back fence-line.
This property also offers side driveway access, front courtyard/vegie patch and a dry-pad for your caravan, boat or trailer.
• 544m2 block approx
• Reverse cycle split systems
• 8000 Litre water tank
• $400 rent pw
• 3 Car garage

Description:
Perfect investment opportunity
This lovely three bedroom, one bath home set on the spacious 539.1m2 (approx) block located in a quiet street of Newcomb will make a perfect investment into the one of the most popular suburbs of Geelong. Located within walking distance to the local shopping centre including Woolworths, Aldi, library, health care and only a short drive into to Geelong CBD. Situated just off Portarlington Highway which is across the road from the old Cheltenham Salt site, this will make a very smart investment for someone looking to cash in when the development is approved.
Great to just set and forget as it has tenants in the property, but is also a great opportunity for a first home buyer or a new family, as it has perfect potential as it has two high schools and a primary school only a couple of hundred meters away.
Don't want to miss this hidden gem tucked away in Newcomb, get in fast as properties in this price range are becoming very rare in Geelong. Currently leased at $325 p/w until 31st May 2019

Description:
Investors, First Home Buyers & Downsizers, Will Reap the Rewards
Located in a quiet St Albans Park street, yet only 10 minutes from Geelong CBD & the Geelong Waterfront, 5 minutes to Bellarine Village and surrounded by a choice of schools, public transport, medical facilities & parkland.
* 3 spacious bedrooms (master with WIR & ensuite)
* Modern kitchen with walk in pantry, 5 burner gas stove top, dishwasher, island with stone benchtop
* Central main bathroom with bath, shower & separate powder room
* Only 6 years young - built by local Smith Constructions Group
* Large open plan kitchen/dining/living full of natural light
* Ducted heating throughout & split system heating/cooling
* Good sized laundry with its on access to a private, light courtyard
* Single lock up garage with internal access
* Neat courtyard with undercover entertaining area & plenty of grass space
* Currently tenanted on a ‘month by month’ basis for $360 p/w
Get in quick, this opportunity won’t last long!

Description:
Perfect Downsizer
This stunning three bedroom, two bathroom, functionally designed, quality townhouse in thriving Newcomb, is ideally located just minutes from Geelong CBD and Botanic Gardens. This gorgeous property set on 359m2 (approx.) is low maintenance and is perfect for anyone looking to downsize.
The master accompanies a walk-in robe and ensuite, two further large bedrooms with built-in robes and a centrally located bathroom with tub. With an ideal open plan kitchen area that features beautiful stainless steel Westinghouse appliances and overlooks the generous living and dining areas with the living area opening onto north facing, paved alfresco area. The elegant neutral tones are sure to suit every taste in decor, a huge laundry with internal access to the single lock-up garage, set on its very own title with separate driveway.
Other features of this property include a gas heater, roller blinds and a water tank.
This property is currently vacant with a rental appraisal of $380-390 per week.

CALLING ALL INVESTORS OR FIRST HOME BUYERS
Situated in central St Albans Park this 3 bedroom, 1 bathroom, open living kitchen/dining/lounge property on 556m2 approx block has so much potential.
This solid property is the ideal addition to your rental portfolio. Also perfect for those wanting to get into the market this could be your first home.
Three good sized bedrooms all with BIRs, central updated bathroom with separate toilet and serviceable kitchen with new S/S Westinghouse oven.
Comprising of drive through SLUG, with a further carport and shed to the rear of the property, new guttering and low maintenance back garden provides plenty of options for many. A large undercover freshly painted outdoor pergola overlooks the north facing backyard.
This solid investment could potentially rent for $320 pw. Minutes from local schools, Newcomb Shopping Village, Splashdown Aquatic Centre and Geelong CBD.

Address: 301 Boundary Rd St Albans Park VIC 3219
Description:
Extend, Update, Develop or Subdivide (STCA).
Endless Possibilities!
This well-maintained home is exceptionally positioned and offering a large allotment of approx. 720m2 which represents endless potential for all families big or small, investors, first homebuyers or developers with the potential to sub-divide (STCA).
The current house with 2 street frontages showcases the light filled interior which presents vast opportunities to renovate and "refresh" or live comfortably as is. Three good sized bedrooms all with built-in robes serviced by the central bathroom which includes bathtub, shower, vanity and toilet. Open plan living that flows through to a sizeable dining/ kitchen with plenty of storage and bench space.
Other features include;
- Split System heating/ cooling
- Ceiling fans throughout
- Large garage with 2 x original stables
- Double carport plus another single carport, great space for boat/ trailer/ caravan or car
- Polish timber floorboards
- large backyard for the kids to run around
Positioned close to Shops and cafes that are within close reach, while Buckley's Entertainment Centre is only a short stroll away for a great meal. Just jump in the car, and you'll be at East Geelong Primary School, Newcomb Secondary College, or the Bellarine Highway shopping centres in an instant. Easy access to public transport, St. Albans Reserve sporting grounds, and Gordon Tafe's East Geelong Campus is another plus.
This solid home will be a refreshing change.

Description:
When location matters.
A great opportunity has come to the market with this 2 bedroom unit. In a highly sought after location in East Geelong, walking distance to schools, shops and public transport this property is a must see on your inspection list.
Comprising of 2 generous bedrooms with BIRs, open plan kitchen/living and updated kitchen with S/S appliances, split system AC, gas heating, remote single LUG, rear door access to the yard area and an under cover pergola. Rear lane access and being the rear unit on the property will give you security and peace of mind.
Units of this nature are a rare find in East Geelong, so don't delay as this property will not last long. Call Jay Roadley 0417 057 775.

Description:
The Perfect Starter, Investment or Downsizer!
Conveniently located, only 5 minutes to Geelong CBD, 10 mins to coastal areas. This home is at an extremely affordable entry price into one of Geelong's most popular suburbs.
Complete with two well sized bedrooms with central main bathroom, toilet and a spacious laundry with extra storage room. Presented in good condition this home comprises formal living with north facing, separate dining area or it could be turned into the second living area. Renovated kitchen displays functional appliances like oven, cooktop, dishwasher and plenty of overhead cupboards and storage. There is also a huge laundry area with an anointed storage room which could be made into the second bathroom. Outside you will find a separate lockable area which would make for a wonderful sized 3rd bedroom or 3nd living room or ideal teenage retreat. You'll be surprised to see the size of yard and it would be ideal to renovate further or extend.
Extra features of the home include; single lock up garage, driveway parking, gas heating and wall air-conditioning in the living area, ceiling fans throughout rooms. New & quality side fencing and rear grassed yard perfect for children or pets.
Situated on a 651m2 block, a fantastic opportunity presents for the astute Investor , rental return $295per week till November 2019 or first home buyer to purchase a premium site to live in after further renovation or transform into a multi-dwelling, quality townhouse development (S.T.C.A). Perfectly located being close to East Geelong shops, public transport and schools. Inspection is a must.

Description:
Stunning Barwon River Frontage
Take your pick or purchase both.
Lot 1 - 40Ha -100 acres approx. and Lot 2 – 42.89 Ha – 106 Acres approx. of well drained rolling landscape with breathtaking views over the Barwon River Valley, gifting you the opportunity to embrace a relaxing rural lifestyle within 20 minutes of Geelong.
Numerous house sites overlooking the fertile river flats will allow you to explore the possibilities of designing and building your ultimate dream home (STCA) and bringing to fruition an enviable self-sufficient lifestyle.
Established pastures are thriving allowing you the opportunity for livestock grazing and majestic River Red Gums provide a naturalistic ambience unique to this area.
This location is second to none being just 20 minutes from Geelong and under 10 minutes from the Geelong Ring Road which will get you to Melbourne in just over an hour approx. without a traffic light in sight.
There is no better time to escape to the country - enquire today!
(In conjunction with HF Richardson – Will Richardson 0418 520 735)

Description:
Investors, First home buyers and Downsizes take note!
Step inside and your search is surely over. This custom designed and built home is perfect for a first home buyer, downsizer or the savvy investor with a potential rental income of $395 - $420 per week. This neat home which has been landscaped for low maintenance living has everything you could ask for with nothing to do but move in and enjoy!
The home features a spacious open plan kitchen, living and dining area with sliding glass doors that open onto the rear facing private outdoor entertaining area and yard, an ideal place to relax on sunshine filled days.
The modern kitchen comes complete with quality stainless steel appliances, the home comprises three sizable bedrooms two have BIR's and master with WIR and ensuite.
The home is completed by the main bathroom, separate toilet, laundry and double lock up garage
With polished floorboards throughout, and neutral tones, this home is the perfect blank canvas to make your mark.
Be quick, homes like this are rare!

Description:
Picture-Perfect Gem in Leafy Location
Set in the warmth of a leafy street, this ready-to-enjoy classic sits happily in one of Geelong's most ambient inner-city locations.
Positioned in a quiet family neighborhood, the immaculately-maintained property enjoys a convenient lifestyle location close to the Garden Street cafe and shopping strip, public transport, the Botanic Gardens and the stunning Geelong Waterfront.
A sound investment in a hotly-contested area, an instantly-appealing street facade with landscaped gardens opens into a stylish entry with high ceilings and polished timber floorboards.
Inside, a light-filled interior highlights preserved period features which perfectly complement the modern open-plan dining, kitchen and living space.
Flowing from the hallway, the main bedroom boasts a beautiful bay window and meticulously-crafted walk-in robe and ensuite, while two further bedrooms (BIR) share a central bathroom with stand-alone ball-and-claw bathtub and luxurious tapware.
Further on, the sparkling kitchen lights up the heart of the home and offers custom-made cabinetry, quality appliances and stylish fittings and fixtures.
An elegant sitting room complete with fireplace provides a comforting retreat while the main living space flows seamlessly through French doors to an alfresco dining and entertaining area set in private and well-established gardens.
Other highlights include central heating, air-conditioning, large laundry, garden shed and rear-lane access.

Description:
Smart Investment
Updated brick home in quiet street with quick access to Geelong CBD and Bellarine Peninsula. The addition of large master bedroom and 2 new bathrooms this formerly humble home is now more than meets the eye. Currently tenanted until end October 2019.
- Four bedrooms, all with built in robes
- Updated kitchen open to spacious dining
- Large family living with polished floorboards
- Plenty of off street parking with carport and garage
- Low maintenance gardens, shed and paved space
- Walk to local shops, quick access to CBD and waterfront
- Solid investment, good tenants for at least six months

Description:
Great location and low maintenance home.
You will feel completely secure and feel like you away from the rest of the world in this cute and cozy 2 bedroom townhouse.  Extremely well presented and great for entertaining with large open kitchen, meals and living all facing out to the north facing courtyard.  The 2 bedrooms are a generous size with built in robes and garage have internal access and enough room for a workshop.  The kitchen is going to please any cook with lovely morning sun drenching in and storage like a full size kitchen, huge benches, breakfast bar, corner pantry 600mm oven and gas cooktop. All located just a short drive to Geelong CBD and close to all public transport, shops and schools.
Rental Estimate $330 p/w
Insights: 2/3 Saltpan Place, Newcomb VIC 3219 was last sold in 2019 and 8 other 2 bedroom unit in Newcomb have recently been sold.

Description:
Gorgeous Character Home In A Great Location
Featuring a gorgeous update, this stunning weatherboard home is a charming blend of original and new. Tucked away in one of East Geelong’s quietest streets, this home will capture your eye from the moment you arrive at the picket fence.
The home showcases a combination of old meeting new with its polished floorboards and impressive high ceilings. Follow through to the open plan kitchen, living and dining area. Original features include an ornamental fireplace capturing the charm of the home. The well-equipped kitchen featuring stainless steel appliances, gas stove top and an abundance of storage.
This stunning home consists of 2 generous sized bedrooms, one with a BIR.
An impressive outdoor patio overlooks the large north facing manicured lawn and the beautiful established veggie garden beds providing a wonderful space.
In a highly desired location of East Geelong, this gorgeous home oozes charm and character. Be prepared to fall in love the moment you walk through the front door.
Other features include:
- Split system cooling
- Plenty of off street parking
- Development potential (STCA).
Insights: 50 Anderson Street, East Geelong VIC 3219 was last sold in 2019 and 16 other 2 bedroom house in East Geelong have recently been sold.
